localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: PASSCARD is an app that helps you to remember card passwords. The app saves passwords on your device offline and securely. The app will never save or collect any information.
nodes.title: PASSCARD - Easy, free and offline cards passwords saver
nodes.author: Belmiro FlÃ¡vio

nodes.excerpt: Showping is the power of word of mouth in your pocket. Showping is a unique app where you can share your Wish and Bought list with friends. It's a place where people can read reviews from someone they trust and do shopping together through screen sharing.
nodes.title: Showping - Show & shop with friends, shopping advice social network
nodes.author: Natallia Rayinchick

nodes.excerpt: Passky is a simple, modern, lightweight, open-source and secure password manager.
nodes.title: Passky - Passky is a simple, modern and open source password manager
nodes.author: Ziga Zajc

nodes.excerpt: we do everything on our phones, so why not taxes too? with glyde, you can pre-fill your ITR with incomes, deductions, tax credits, bank accounts. import trades from your broker and investment platform & much more. save, pay, file & track taxes with a few taps.
nodes.title: glyde - The hippest, coolest & the fastest way to do your taxes
nodes.author: Vishvajit Sonagara

nodes.excerpt: Explore your top songs, artists, and podcasts from a year that was far from normal.
nodes.title: 2021 Wrapped by Spotify - Relive all the music you discovered and loved in 2021.
nodes.author: BjÃ¶rn Antonissen

nodes.excerpt: BoldVoice helps non-native English speakers communicate clearly and confidently in English. The app gives you video lessons from Hollywood accent coaches and instant feedback on your pronunciation from speech AI. Get it on iOS & Android!
nodes.title: BoldVoice 2.0 - Accent coaching app for non-native English speakers
nodes.author: Anada Lakra

nodes.excerpt: GoDog is an app with a set of lessons for dogs and their owners, created with the support of experienced dog trainers. A dog training and walking plan, a health diary, and a walking tracker in the app help you keep your pet well-behaved, healthy, and happy.
nodes.title: GoDog - Raise a well-behaved dog and build a stronger bond with it.
nodes.author: Volha Basak

nodes.excerpt: Take your metrics on the go with our Android app! The ChartMogul Subscription Data Platform makes it easy to import your billing data and then analyze it like a pro with industry-leading subscription analytics.
nodes.title: The ChartMogul Android App - Track your SaaS metrics on the go, now on Android
nodes.author: Bianca Wilk

nodes.excerpt: Send Documents, Invoices, Letters physically to anywhere in the world Have Documents Printed, Folded and Mailed by us, starting at $1
nodes.title: SendLetters - Send letters online
nodes.author: Fawaz Ahmed

nodes.excerpt: Web3 enables shared ownership and rewarding actual contributions. On Phaver you help others by sharing your best recommendations and get rewarded with tokens and DAO ownership. Join communities around your interests and collect the best things together.
nodes.title: Phaver - Decentralized recommendation app with crypto rewards
nodes.author: Johannes Frank

nodes.excerpt: Pancea makes chronic pain relief easily accessible and affordable. The app develops customized exercise and stress management routines. User's experienced a 80% reduction of pain levels by 12 weeks without booking 1 appointment. FREE registration code:easepain
nodes.title: Pancea - Chronic pain relief mobile application
nodes.author: Ashley Hunt

nodes.excerpt: Momint allows artists to post their work as NFTs, sell them, and receive tips. This enables smaller artists to break into the NFT space, experiment with blockchain technology for the first time and build a following.
nodes.title: Momint  - The NFT Marketplace for when the bubble bursts
nodes.author: Steph

nodes.excerpt: Earn yield and trade cryptocurrencies. Deposit your USD or crypto to earn compounding returns. Earn rewards in USDT, USDC, BTC and more. Withdraw any time directly to USD. No deposit, withdrawal, spread or transfer fees. $40 USDC earning bonus for new users.
nodes.title: Coinchange.io - Earn & buy crypto, get safe passive income from DeFi yield
nodes.author: Peter Valin

nodes.excerpt: Tuned is where crypto trading bots are born. Discover high-performing strategy creators, select a hedge fund-like syndication that matches your risk and growth goals- then sit back and watch signals come in!
nodes.title: Tuned - Automated crypto trading for everyone
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Halalin was made to help Muslims who travel the world to find Halal food, restaurant, and prayer room around them. You can easily find the right food and place for you to meet your needs in worship insyaallah.
nodes.title: Halalin - Help Muslims to find halal food, restaurant, and prayer room
nodes.author: Robihamanto

nodes.excerpt: Collect, organize & understand your data. Free & unlimited!. Formaloo is a powerful no-code collaboration platform that enables you to build databases, forms & even custom business applications fast & code-free!
nodes.title: Formaloo 2.0 for Mobile - Mobile database & form builder, made for teams
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Ladder, the next-gen professional community platform, is now on iOS and Android! Find your community, share resources, engage in discussions, land your dream job, and form meaningful relationships with peers and mentors, all in the palm of your hands.
nodes.title: Ladder Mobile App - The next-gen professional community platform, now on mobile
nodes.author: Alexis Ohanian

nodes.excerpt: Lili is a personal health assistant who sits on top of your health data and helps you improve it through advanced data analytics. ğŸŒ± Receive daily tasks based on your patterns, challenge friends, analyze parameters, and stay on top of your health. ğŸ”¥
nodes.title: Lili - Reverse engineer your health data and get back on track.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Forkist is a social network focused solely on sharing your restaurant experiences and recommendations with your connections. Rather than relying on reviews from strangers, you can now tap into your network to find the best places to eat!
nodes.title: Forkist - Food focused social network to eat, connect, and share
nodes.author: Chris Hauck

nodes.excerpt: We made a small app in collaboration with a psychologist which will serve as a safe haven for people with severe social anxiety, here they can discuss their issues among themselves without stigma or judgement. Heavily curated and moderated.
nodes.title: Spark - Helping socially anxious people grow and develop
nodes.author: Daniel Ricketman

nodes.excerpt: Beacon is a navigation sharing app for sharing ETA and arrival notifications while keeping location private. ETA is updated as routes and conditions change. Sharing can be between two or more people, making it perfect for groups and meet ups of any size.
nodes.title: Beacon - Navigation sharing made simple and easy
nodes.author: Juan

nodes.excerpt: INDmoney is a SuperMoney app to track, save, plan & invest. INDmoney automatically & securely tracks all your investments, loans, expenses, credit cards, savings a/cs, PFâ€™s, EPFâ€™s. You can track across brokers, banks, distributors & advisors.
nodes.title: INDmoney - SuperMoneyApp to track and invest at zero commission
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Simply enter a text prompt and our AI ğŸ¨ transforms your words into works of art ğŸ–¼ï¸ AI Art generation is usually a laborious process, starryai makes that process simple, intuitive and accessible to anyone with a cellphone. Try it out today! â€
nodes.title: starryai - Create art from text prompts
nodes.author: Mo Kahn

nodes.excerpt: Entre is an All-In-One platform that allows users to create content, network, and make money from anywhere in the world. We are focused on supporting and helping Entrepreneurs, Investors, and Freelancers so they can thrive in the new economy.
nodes.title: Entre 2.0 - The new professional network
nodes.author: Michael Marra

nodes.excerpt: Tune into a once-in-a-species event, Mother Nature dying. Listen to the haunting sounds of our dying planet on our iOS and Android apps. A harrowing Halloween audio experience to spook and shock yourself, friends and followers to reconsider our lifestyles.
nodes.title: Mother Nature Dying - A harrowing Halloween audio experience to spook and shock
nodes.author: Fraser Deans

nodes.excerpt: Welcome to the Metaverse, a smart place for networking. Virtually meet real people just like at events in real life. Come visit our festival Products of the Future and the Metaverse Gallery. Expect engaging panels on how to design the all-new products.
nodes.title: Connect.Club 2.0 - Social network in the Metaverse for genuine human connection
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Xantos Labs is an active investment platform that manages your money so that you donâ€™t have to. Get a managed account and effortlessly invest like the 1% with low-fee & institutional-quality service built with everyday folk in mind.
nodes.title: Xantos Labs - Active investment platform for anyone in the world
nodes.author: Yoshi Yokokawa

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Checkaso 2.5: a data-driven ASO platform made by ASO specialists. Everything you need to compete in stores and become #1: tools for collecting semantics, analyze competitors, tracking keywords, gaining insights, localize for new markets and more!
nodes.title: Checkaso - App store optimization platform to reach #1 in app stores
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: VOOM introduces the first ever per-mile insurance for motorcycles. VOOMâ€™s innovative product is 100% digital & doesnâ€™t require tracking or hardware. Just snap a photo of the odometer and enjoy a flexible insurance premium that reduces your costs.
nodes.title: VOOM Insurance - The first per mile insurance for motorcycles
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Use Impressions to create hyper-realistic face swaps and insert celebrity faces into any video or image you create. Make fan films, show off your impersonation skills, recreate classic scenes, create new memes, and share them with your friends and family.
nodes.title: Impressions App - Your videos with hyper realistic celebrity face swaps
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Urlgapp is a tool that converts your existing web applications into Android apps, automagically. It works with any responsive web-sites, regardless of the platform they have been built on. Simply fill out the form and we'll get it ready in a few minutes
nodes.title: URLgApp 1.0 - Convert any website to Android app in a few minutes for free
nodes.author: Amr Dessouki

nodes.excerpt: We help you discover and understand long-term quality stocks by tapping into the collective wisdom of financial experts.
nodes.title: CashRaksha - Discover long-term stock picks
nodes.author: Srikanth Srungarapu

nodes.excerpt: Diem is a knowledge-sharing platform and digital safe space built for women and non-binary people.
nodes.title: Diem - A social universe for knowledge-sharing
nodes.author: Taylor Majewski

nodes.excerpt: GoHenry gives families the tools they need to nurture financially healthy kids: a debit card & app, now with gamified Money Missions. Money Missions are fun, interactive lessons designed to build confidence, literacy, and curiosity in 6-18-year-olds.
nodes.title: GoHenry - Money Missions - Gamified Fin Ed: build confidence, literacy, & curiosity
nodes.author: Kashem Miah

nodes.excerpt: Share in the joy of giving with your remote team, your online friends & family, and even total strangers while remaining anonymous. ğŸ… Create/Join Secret Santa Parties ğŸ’¸ Get Paid for hosting Parties ğŸ Jolly Duo: Instantly Match with a Gifting Partner
nodes.title: Jolly - Modern Secret Santa app to anonymously give & receive
nodes.author: David Gorski

nodes.excerpt: belo is the simplest wallet to use pesos & cryptocurrencies. With belo you can deposit pesos and transform them into BTC, ETH, USDC, USDT or DAI without commissions or unnecessary complications Forgetting a ğŸ¤ about inflation has never been so simple
nodes.title: Belo - The simplest way to start using crypto
nodes.author: Edwin Rager

nodes.excerpt: Call your prospects at the right time, no matter where you are. Use your cell phone to reach out, follow up and stay connected. Try Woodpecker Calls to get closer to your ideal customers.
nodes.title: Woodpecker Calls - Leads in your pocket to schedule & track sales calls
nodes.author: Matt Tarczynski

nodes.excerpt: Interakt enables small & medium businesses to manage customer interactions, facilitate sales and customer support on WhatsApp. Powered by official WhatsApp Business APIs, Interakt provides a shared Inbox, campaign manager, Shopify integration & more.
nodes.title: Interakt - Grow your business faster on WhatsApp Business
nodes.author: Aakrit A Vaish

nodes.excerpt: How do you get smart training without a professional coach? You can easily do it with our mobile app! It combines computer vision, the expertise of trainers, rehabilitation specialists, and, most important â€“ a world-class athlete's experience. Time to train!
nodes.title: Professional Weightlifting - Training & nutrition app for un-professional weightlifters
nodes.author: Dmitry Titov

nodes.excerpt: The most sustainable Fairphone yet, now with 5G speed, 5-year warranty and electronic waste neutral. You donâ€™t need to be an expert to swap out the battery or display. No part of Fairphone 4 is glued shut, so you can choose to easily repair it yourself.
nodes.title: Fairphone 4 - A sustainable, modular phone built to last
nodes.author: Calum Webb

nodes.excerpt: Plans makes it easy to expand your social life and keep track of it using a streamlined event calendar. Use the app to plan fun activities, meet new people, meet friends, and make meaningful experiences in real life. Plans is the event organizer for everyone!
nodes.title: Plans - The ultimate social event planner app for real-life meetups!
nodes.author: Adnan Kharuf

nodes.excerpt: This is the only free way to search Amazon's Best Sellers. Plus you can add it to your website and earn commissions too.
nodes.title: Search Best Sellers - Search Amazon's most-ordered products
nodes.author: Michael Diaz

nodes.excerpt: RecSpot is a social app that makes sharing what you love with your friends easy and fun. RecSpot is a new, go-to destination for exchanging, discovering, and watching your favorite movies and television shows. All recommended by people you know and trust.
nodes.title: RecSpot - Recommendations powered by people you know and trust
nodes.author: Ian OBrien

nodes.excerpt: KADO helps you to better connect with your clients, exchange business cards, manage contacts, record notes and interactions on prospects to stay on top of your game. Powerful integrations & intuitive UI will help you better manage and convert your prospects
nodes.title: KADO - Digital business card & relationship management solution
nodes.author: Ophir Gadot

nodes.excerpt: You only have so much time and effort to give. With Sidekick, easily prioritize and dedicate your energy to people who matter most.
nodes.title: Sidekick - Make time for people who matter
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: MyRide901 is a mobile app that captures and manages vehicle maintenance videos, images and documents in Service Events on a shareable timeline. Features include an Accident Reporting tool & Next Service Lookup that advises of service that should be performed.
nodes.title: MyRide901 - Capture, manage and share your vehicles' service history
nodes.author: Victor W. von Buchstab

nodes.excerpt: Volv is for those who want to consume great content and for ï¸those who create great content. What readers will find: breaking news, hype trends, crypto updates & more What writers will get: a platform to help you get discovered by thousands in 100+ countries
nodes.title: Volv 2.0 - The best content on the internet in 9-sec reads in real-time
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Kommunity is an ultimate community-focused social event platform to grow your community locally and internationally, organize events easily and communicate with your members within one place.
nodes.title: Kommunity - Community-focused social event platform
